languages.text: {n}Идира издает холодящий душу вопль и пытается схватиться за терзающую ее руку, но пальцы проходят сквозь плоть чудовища.{/n} "Я не слышала! Не слышала ничего, что могло хотя бы намекнуть... Простите, Лорд-капитан, я не смогла... А-а-а-а-а!" {n}Женщина заходится в захлебывающемся вопле, а вы чувствуете, как воздух вокруг вас стремительно холодеет.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Идира издает холодящий душу вопль и пытается схватиться за терзающую ее руку, но пальцы проходят сквозь плоть чудовища.{/n} "Я не слышала! Не слышала ничего, что могло хотя бы намекнуть... Простите, Лорд-капитан, я не смогла... А-а-а-а-а!" {n}Женщина заходится в захлебывающемся вопле, а вы чувствуете, как воздух вокруг вас стремительно холодеет.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira lets out a soul-chilling howl and tries to grab the hand tearing into her, but her fingers pass through the monster's flesh.{/n} "I didn't hear anything! I didn't hear anything that could have had anything to do with you... I'm sorry, Lord Captain, I failed... Aaaah!" {n}Idira breaks into a strangled scream and you feel the air around you grow rapidly colder.{/n}

Не слышала ничего, что могло хотя бы намекнуть... Простите, Лорд-капитан, я не смогла... А-а-а-а-а!" {n}Женщина заходится в захлебывающемся вопле, а вы чувствуете, как воздух вокруг вас стремительно холодеет.{/n}

Aaaah!" {n}Idira breaks into a strangled scream and you feel the air around you grow rapidly colder.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉发出了令人胆寒的嚎叫声，试图抓住插进她脑袋里的手，但她的手指却穿过了那个怪物的躯体。{/n}“我什么都没听到！我没听到任何与您有关的事情……我很抱歉，舰长大人！我辜负了您……啊啊啊啊啊！”{n}伊迪拉爆发出了凄惨的尖叫声，你感觉身边的空气迅速变冷。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Idira lets out a soul-chilling howl and tries to grab the hand tearing into her, but her fingers pass through the monster's flesh.{/n} "I didn't hear anything! I didn't hear anything that could have had anything to do with you... I'm sorry, Lord Captain, I failed... Aaaah!" {n}Idira breaks into a strangled scream and you feel the air around you grow rapidly colder.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉发出了令人胆寒的嚎叫声，试图抓住插进她脑袋里的手，但她的手指却穿过了那个怪物的躯体。{/n}“我什么都没听到！我没听到任何与您有关的事情……我很抱歉，舰长大人！我辜负了您……啊啊啊啊啊！”{n}伊迪拉爆发出了凄惨的尖叫声，你感觉身边的空气迅速变冷。{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira emite un aullido escalofriante y trata de agarrar la mano que la atraviesa, pero el monstruo es intangible para ella.{/n} «¡No oí nada! No oí nada relacionado con usted... Lo siento, Lord Capitán, la he fallado... ¡Aaaah!». {n}Idira produce un grito ahogado y sientes que la temperatura de toda la zona baja rápidamente.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Idira lets out a soul-chilling howl and tries to grab the hand tearing into her, but her fingers pass through the monster's flesh.{/n} "I didn't hear anything! I didn't hear anything that could have had anything to do with you... I'm sorry, Lord Captain, I failed... Aaaah!" {n}Idira breaks into a strangled scream and you feel the air around you grow rapidly colder.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira emite un aullido escalofriante y trata de agarrar la mano que la atraviesa, pero el monstruo es intangible para ella.{/n} «¡No oí nada! No oí nada relacionado con usted... Lo siento, Lord Capitán, la he fallado... ¡Aaaah!». {n}Idira produce un grito ahogado y sientes que la temperatura de toda la zona baja rápidamente.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}イディラは魂を凍らせるような雄叫びを上げ、自分を引き裂く手を掴もうとしたが、指は怪物の肉体を通り抜けた。{/n}「何も聞こえなかった！陛下のことは何も聞こえなかったの…ごめんなさい、ロード・キャプテン、あたいは失…ああああ！」{n}イディラが悲鳴を上げ、周囲の空気が急速に冷え込むのを感じる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Idira lets out a soul-chilling howl and tries to grab the hand tearing into her, but her fingers pass through the monster's flesh.{/n} "I didn't hear anything! I didn't hear anything that could have had anything to do with you... I'm sorry, Lord Captain, I failed... Aaaah!" {n}Idira breaks into a strangled scream and you feel the air around you grow rapidly colder.{/n}

traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira stößt einen markerschütternden Schrei aus und greift nach der Hand, die in sie eindringt, aber ihre Finger greifen ins Leere.{/n} "Ich habe nichts gehört! Ich habe nichts gehört, das etwas mit Euch hätte zu tun haben können ... Es tut mir leid, Lord Captain. Ich habe versagt... Aaaah!" {n}Idira stößt einen erstickten Schrei aus und du spürst, wie die Luft um dich herum kälter wird.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Idira lets out a soul-chilling howl and tries to grab the hand tearing into her, but her fingers pass through the monster's flesh.{/n} "I didn't hear anything! I didn't hear anything that could have had anything to do with you... I'm sorry, Lord Captain, I failed... Aaaah!" {n}Idira breaks into a strangled scream and you feel the air around you grow rapidly colder.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira stößt einen markerschütternden Schrei aus und greift nach der Hand, die in sie eindringt, aber ihre Finger greifen ins Leere.{/n} "Ich habe nichts gehört! Ich habe nichts gehört, das etwas mit Euch hätte zu tun haben können ... Es tut mir leid, Lord Captain. Ich habe versagt... Aaaah!" {n}Idira stößt einen erstickten Schrei aus und du spürst, wie die Luft um dich herum kälter wird.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira pousse un hurlement à glacer le sang et tente de saisir la main qui lui fouille la cervelle, mais ses doigts passent à travers les chairs du monstre sans trouver la moindre prise.{/n} « Je n'avais rien entendu ! Rien qui vous concerne de près ou de loin... Pardonnez-moi, seigneure-capitaine, j'ai échoué... Aaaah ! » {n}Elle pousse un hurlement étranglé, et vous sentez l'air autour de vous refroidir à toute vitesse.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Idira lets out a soul-chilling howl and tries to grab the hand tearing into her, but her fingers pass through the monster's flesh.{/n} "I didn't hear anything! I didn't hear anything that could have had anything to do with you... I'm sorry, Lord Captain, I failed... Aaaah!" {n}Idira breaks into a strangled scream and you feel the air around you grow rapidly colder.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira pousse un hurlement à glacer le sang et tente de saisir la main qui lui fouaille la cervelle, mais ses doigts passent à travers les chairs du monstre sans trouver la moindre prise.{/n} « Je n'avais rien entendu ! Rien qui vous concerne de près ou de loin... Pardonnez-moi, seigneure-capitaine, j'ai échoué... Aaaah ! » {n}Elle pousse un hurlement étranglé, et vous sentez l'air autour de vous refroidir à toute vitesse.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}İdira, kan dondurucu bir çığlık atıp kafasına saplanan eli tutmaya çalışıyor ama parmakları, canavarın içinden geçiyor.{/n} "Hiçbir şey duymadım ben! Seninle ilgili hiçbir şey duymadım... Üzgünüm Lord Kaptan, seni hayal kırıklığına uğrattım... Aaaah!" {n}İdira, boğulurcasına bir çığlık atıyor. Havanın hızla soğuduğunu hissediyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Idira lets out a soul-chilling howl and tries to grab the hand tearing into her, but her fingers pass through the monster's flesh.{/n} "I didn't hear anything! I didn't hear anything that could have had anything to do with you... I'm sorry, Lord Captain, I failed... Aaaah!" {n}Idira breaks into a strangled scream and you feel the air around you grow rapidly colder.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}İdira, kan dondurucu bir çığlık atıyor ve kafasına saplanan eli tutmaya çalışıyor ama parmakları, canavarın içinden geçiyor.{/n} "Hiçbir şey duymadım ben! Seninle ilgili hiçbir şey duymadım... Üzgünüm Lord Kaptan, seni hayal kırıklığına uğrattım... Aaaah!" {n}İdira boğulurcasına bir çığlık atıyor ve etrafındaki havanın hızla soğuduğunu hissediyorsun.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
